
{{alias}}( x )
    Evaluates the probability mass function (PMF) for Rademacher distribution.

    If provided `NaN`, the function returns `NaN`.

    If `x < -1.0` or `x > 1.0`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Evaluated PMF.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( -1.0 )
    0.5
    > y = {{alias}}( 1.0 )
    0.5
    > y = {{alias}}( 0.4 )
    0.0
    > y = {{alias}}( NaN )
    NaN
    > y = {{alias}}( 1.2 )
    NaN
    > y = {{alias}}( -2.4 )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
